work_experience.title: Agile Delivery Manager / Release Train Engineer
work_experience.description: Leading SAFe-based Agile Release Train for global insurance platform modernization on AWS. Driving PI Planning, coordinating cross-functional delivery, and building high-performing teams.
bullets: Facilitate quarterly PI Planning sessions coordinating priorities across product, engineering, and business stakeholders
Manage ART-level dependencies, risks, and impediments ensuring predictable delivery across 6-sprint PIs
Coach and mentor agile teams driving continuous improvement through Inspect & Adapt workshops
Built new cross-functional team achieving delivery velocity parity within first quarter
Increased team capacity by 15% and reduced conflicts by 60% through mentoring and process optimization

work_experience.title: Senior Agile Program Manager / Release Train Engineer
work_experience.description: Directed large-scale Agile Release Train (50+ engineers) delivering regulatory compliance and cloud transformation programs. Managed intake, prioritization, execution, and release across geographically distributed teams.
bullets: Planned, coordinated, and facilitated PI Planning for cloud migration program (20+ applications, 50+ microservices)
Coached agile teams of 50+ engineers, improving delivery predictability by 20% and reducing incidents by 50%
Managed ART-level risks and dependencies for DB-Fidessa M&A integration across 15 countries — 98% SIT success
Optimized flow of value through release management automation — tripled release frequency, $1.2M annual savings
Synthesized metrics and communicated ART-level data to executive stakeholders through regular System Demos
Fostered safe, collaborative environment ensuring 100% audit success across regulatory programs

work_experience.title: Agile Program Manager / Scrum Master
work_experience.description: Led infrastructure transformation program (13,000+ sites) coordinating multiple agile teams and vendors
bullets: Facilitated planning sessions and retrospectives driving continuous improvement — 99% data integrity achieved
Consolidated vendor landscape (12→4) reducing management overhead by 40% through stakeholder alignment
Mentored team members and promoted professional growth, building high-performing delivery organization

work_experience.title: Senior Project Manager
work_experience.description: Managed enterprise programs for Fortune 500 clients (Lukoil, PepsiCo, Pfizer) across energy, retail, pharma
bullets: Facilitated executive workshops aligning technical delivery with business objectives — 25,000 users across 12 countries
Led cross-functional teams delivering SAP/Ariba integration across 15 markets with successful adoption

education.school: Moscow State University of Instrument Engineering and Informatics

skills.summary:
SAFe & Agile Leadership: PI Planning, ART Coordination, System Demos, Inspect & Adapt, Agile Coaching, Scrum, Kanban
Program Delivery: Intake & Prioritization, Dependency Management, Risk Management, Release Management, Value Flow Optimization
People Management: Team Building, Mentoring & Coaching, Performance Management, Professional Development, Conflict Resolution
Stakeholder Engagement: Executive Communication, Cross-Functional Alignment, Vendor Management, Business Value Realization

salary.template:
Given my extensive experience leading large-scale cloud transformation programs, managing cross-functional teams, and driving delivery excellence in Agile and SAFe environments, I believe a competitive total compensation range for this role would be $135,000 to $155,000. This reflects both the scope of responsibility outlined and current market rates for similar positions at the manager level.

That said, I am flexible and open to further discussion based on the overall compensation package, benefits, and growth opportunities at {COMPANY}. My primary focus is finding a long-term fit where I can deliver strong results and grow with the team.

demographics.disability_status: No, I do not have a disability and have not had one in the past
